Actions.value: The Aurigan Restoration is as good as their word. We got a hell of a haul on this one, Commander. The amount of Future Tech we got is insane. Stop by the MechBay to check it out.
The Aurigan Restoration is as good as their word. It's not as good as we could've gotten, but it's something.
